name: <red>Jiibayabooz</>
title: Lv. 1: Jiibayabooz
text:
Arcana: <icon>Fool</>Fool{br}Weak: <icon>Fire</>Fire{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Earth</>Magna     <icon>Tarunda</>Tarunda
STR: 3{br}MAG: 5{br}SKL: 4{br}SPD: 4{br}DEF: 6{br}RES: 5{br}LCK: 2
Background:{br}Brother of the hero Nanabozho in Ojibwe mythology. He was killed by water spirits and made the ruler of the underworld by his brother.

name: Pixie
title: Lv. 2: Pixie
text:
Arcana: <icon>Lovers</>Lovers{br}Weak: <icon>Wind</>Wind{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Electric</>Zio     <icon>Support</>Dia
STR: 1{br}MAG: 7{br}SKL: 5{br}SPD: 6{br}DEF: 1{br}RES: 6{br}LCK: 6
Background:{br}Friendly fairies of the forest that tend to hide from humans. They like to play tricks on lazy people. It is said they are the souls of dead, unbaptized children.

name: Angel
title: Lv. 2: Angel
text:
Arcana: <icon>Justice</>Justice{br}Weak: <icon>Electric</>Electric{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Wind</>Garu     <icon>Sukukaja</>Sukukaja
STR: 3{br}MAG: 5{br}SKL: 7{br}SPD: 4{br}DEF: 3{br}RES: 8{br}LCK: 2
Background:{br}Ninth of the nine orders of angels. The watchers who never sleep. Among these are the guardian angels who are assigned to every human at birth.

name: Mokoi
title: Lv. 2: Mokoi
text:
Arcana: <icon>Death</>Death{br}Weak: <icon>Fire</>Fire{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Fear</>Evil Touch     <icon>Support</>Patra
STR: 4{br}MAG: 4{br}SKL: 3{br}SPD: 2{br}DEF: 7{br}RES: 3{br}LCK: 9
Background:{br}Evil spirits of Murngin lore believed to be reborn shadows. They kidnap and eat children, and strike down any sorcerer who uses black magic.

name: Nekomata
title: Lv. 3: Nekomata
text:
Arcana: <icon>Hermit</>Hermit{br}Weak: <icon>Electric</>Electric{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Water</>Aqua     <icon>Fire</>Maragi{br}<icon>Rakunda</>Rakunda
STR: 2{br}MAG: 4{br}SKL: 7{br}SPD: 9{br}DEF: 2{br}RES: 7{br}LCK: 4
Background:{br}Incarnations of long-lived cats in Japanese mythology. They have various powers, including human speech and control over the dead.

name: Apsaras
title: Lv. 3: Apsaras
text:
Arcana: <icon>Priestess</>Priestess{br}Weak: <icon>Fire</>Fire{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Ice</>Bufu     <icon>Water</>Aqua{br}<icon>Support</>Patra
STR: 1{br}MAG: 10{br}SKL: 3{br}SPD: 5{br}DEF: 0{br}RES: 10{br}LCK: 6
Background:{br}Hindu water spirits, they are beautiful young women who dance for the gods. They also guide heroes fallen in battle to paradise.

name: Ara Mitama
title: Lv. 3: Ara Mitama
text:
Arcana: <icon>Chariot</>Chariot{br}Weak: <icon>Wind</>Wind{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Phys</>Bash     <icon>Rage</>Balzac{br}<icon>Rakukaja</>Rakukaja
STR: 9{br}MAG: 0{br}SKL: 6{br}SPD: 4{br}DEF: 6{br}RES: 3{br}LCK:7 
Background:{br}One of the four aspects of Shinto thought, it has the power to grant ferocity. It is said to aid in one’s bravery, growth, and endeavors, though it can lead in a negative direction.

name: Forneus
title: Lv. 4: Forneus
text:
Arcana: <icon>Emperor</>Emperor{br}Weak: <icon>Earth</>Earthbr}Skills:{br}<icon>Phys</>Slash     <icon>Ice</>Mabufu{br}<icon>Tarukaja</>Tarukaja
STR: 4{br}MAG: 5{br}SKL: 2{br}SPD: 3{br}DEF: 9{br}RES: 8{br}LCK: 7 
Background:{br}One of the 72 demons of the Goetia, he appears as a great sea monster. Known as the great Marquis of Hell, he is skilled linguistically, and is a master of rhetoric.

name: Incubus
title: Lv. 4: Incubus
text:
Arcana: <icon>Devil</>Devil{br}Weak: <icon>Light</>Light{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Fire</>Agi     <icon>Almighty</>Life Drain{br}<icon>Charm</>Marin Karin
STR: 3{br}MAG: 8{br}SKL: 4{br}SPD: 10{br}DEF: 4{br}RES: 3{br}LCK: 6 
Background:{br}A male demon of European lore in medieval times. They visit sleeping women and have sexual intercourse with them. The resulting children become witches or wizards.

name: Valkyrie
title: Lv. 4: Valkyrie
text:
Arcana: <icon>Strength</>Strength{br}Weak: <icon>Dark</>Dark{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Phys</>Slash     <icon>Phys</>Vacuum Slash{br}<icon>Light</>Kouha
STR: 6{br}MAG: 6{br}SKL: 4{br}SPD: 6{br}DEF: 5{br}RES: 7{br}LCK: 4 
Background:{br}Choosers of the slain in Norse lore. Armed with shining armor and swords, they look for brave warriors to take to Valhalla, so that they may fight in Ragnarok.

name: Jack Frost
title: Lv. 5: Jack Frost
text:
Arcana: <icon>Magician</>Magician{br}Weak: <icon>Fire</>Fire{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Ice</>Bufula     <icon>Ice</>Mabufu{br}<icon>Confusion</>Pulinpa
STR: 2{br}MAG: 10{br}SKL: 7{br}SPD: 7{br}DEF: 2{br}RES: 3{br}LCK: 10 
Background:{br}A winter fairy of European descent. He leaves ice patterns on windows and nips people’s noses. Though normally an innocent creature, he will freeze his victims to death if provoked.

name: Slime
title: Lv. 5: Slime
text:
Arcana: <icon>Chariot</>Chariot{br}Weak: <icon>Fire</>Fire, <icon>Water</>Water, <icon>Light</>Light{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Phys</>Bash     <icon>Dark</>Eiha{br}<icon>Fear</>Evil Touch
STR: 6{br}MAG: 3{br}SKL: 2{br}SPD: 0{br}DEF: 13{br}RES: 10{br}LCK: 7 
Background:{br}A primitive monster with a viscous body. There are various theories as to its origin, but it is still under debate. Said to compulsively collect shiny objects.

name: Fortuna
title: Lv. 5: Fortuna
text:
Arcana: <icon>Fortune</>Fortune{br}Weak: <icon>Earth</>Earth{br}Skills:{br}<icon>Wind</>Magaru     <icon>Support</>Patra{br}<icon>Almighty</>Lady Luck
STR: 3{br}MAG: 7{br}SKL: 6{br}SPD: 8{br}DEF: 0{br}RES: 2{br}LCK: 15 
Background:{br}The Roman goddess of luck, she spins the Wheel of Fortune. She is believed to have originally been a fertility goddess. Her Greek counterpart is Tyche.

name: Fear
title: Fear
text:
Type: <violet>Cognitive</>
Victim is unable to attack or counterattack for 1 turn. Grants +15 AVO.

name: Confused
title: Confused
text:
Type: <violet>Cognitive</>
Victim cannot tell friend from foe and will attack indiscriminately for 2 turns.

name: Toxin
title: Toxin
text:
Type: <brown>Biological</>
Victim loses -2 in all combat stats except LCK for 2 turns. Can stack up to 5 times.

name: Down
title: Down
text:
Type: <red>Combat</>
Victim cannot counterattack for one round of combat. Cleared on next phase.
